title: Producer, Audiobook Production
overview: The Producer, Audiobook Production position at Spotify Publishing Partnership Team is looking for an experienced and organized individual to manage audiobook production projects, coordinate internal and external parties, and deliver work adhering to Spotify brand guidelines.
description:
Spotify Publishing Partnership Team is looking for a collaborative, organized, and experienced audiobook producer with proven leadership skills to join our team. This individual should have a clear understanding of the efforts required to produce a high quality audiobook. This position requires significant experience managing audiobook production project through the various stages of the production (pre-production, casting, recording, QC, and engineering). 

This candidate is an expert in coordinating internal and external parties, capable of managing multiple productions simultaneously, updating data within project management software, and the ability to adapt to unexpected changes during the production process 
This candidate should have thorough experience in working with external vendors, crafting SOWs with a clearly defined scope, budget and schedule. The Producer must deliver work that is on strategy and adheres to Spotify brand guidelines. Success in this role will come from someone who is an inspirational leader in making content that can move our collective mission forward; and is creative, adaptive, entrepreneurial and enterprising.Â
